member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants
member.summary: Constants used by 51Degrees Aspect Engines.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_MAX_EVIDENCE_LENGTH
member.summary: The maximum length of a piece of evidence's value which can be added to the usage data being sent.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_MAX_QUEUE_SIZE
member.summary: The default maximum size of the usage data queue which is stored before sending to the remote service.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_ADD_TIMEOUT
member.summary: The default timeout in milliseconds to use when adding usage data to the queue.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_TAKE_TIMEOUT
member.summary: The default timeout in milliseconds to use when taking usage data from the queue.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_REPEAT_EVIDENCE_INTERVAL
member.summary: The default repeat evidence interval in minutes. This is the maximum time to consider a set of evidence as a match for another (and thus, prevent it from being shared)

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_SHARE_PERCENTAGE
member.summary: The default percentage of requests to include in usage sharing. 1 = 100% 0.5 = 50% etc.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_MIN_ENTRIES_PER_MESSAGE
member.summary: The default minimum entries per usage sharing message. No data will be sent until this amount is reached.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.SHARE_USAGE_DEFAULT_URL
member.summary: The default URL to send usage data to

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.EVIDENCE_SESSIONID_SUFFIX
member.summary: The suffix for 'session id' data populated and used by the and other internal Pipeline elements.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.EVIDENCE_SESSIONID
member.summary: session id evidence constant.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.EVIDENCE_SEQUENCE_SUFIX
member.summary: The suffix for 'sequence' data populated and used by the and other internal Pipeline elements.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.EVIDENCE_SEQUENCE
member.summary: Sequence evidence constant.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Constants.EVIDENCE_HTTPHEADER_COOKIE_SUFFIX
member.summary: Constant Added to blocked HTTP Headers so that the cookie header is blocked by default.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage
member.summary: This filter is used by the . It will include anything that is: 1) An HTTP header that is not blocked by the constructor parameter. 2) A cookie that starts with or is the asp session cookie (if configured in the constructor). 3) An query string parameters that have been configured to be shared using the constructor parameter. 4) Not a header, cookie or query string parameter.
member.remarks: As this filter is generally inclusive, it will often cause far more evidence to be passed into a pipeline than the engine-specific filters, which tend to be based on a list of values to include such as .

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage._includeSession
member.summary: If true then the asp.net session cookie will be included in the filter.
member.remarks: The session cookie is used by the but we do not actually want to share it.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage._shareAll
member.summary: If true then all evidence will always be shared.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage._aspSessionCookieName
member.summary: The cookie name being used to store the asp.net session id.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage._blockedHttpHeaders
member.summary: The content of HTTP headers in this array will not be included in the request information sent to 51degrees. Any header names added here are hard-coded to be blocked regardless of the settings passed to the constructor.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage._includedQueryStringParams
member.summary: Query string parameters will not be shared by default. Any query string parameters to be shared must be added to this collection.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Using this constructor will create a filter that allows all evidence. I.e. All evidence will be shared.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: A list of the names of the HTTP headers that share usage should not send to 51Degrees.
A list of the names of query string parameters that share usage should send to 51Degrees. If this value is null, all query string parameters are shared.
If true then the asp.net session cookie will be included in the filter.
The name of the cookie that contains the asp.net session id.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage.Include(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the specified evidence key is included by this filter.
member.param: The key to check
member.returns: True if the key is included and false if not.
member.exception: Thrown if the supplied key is null

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsage.Order(System.String)
member.summary: Return the 'order of precedence of the specified evidence key. Lower values indicate evidence where the value is more likely to provide differentiation between requests. This is used by features such as Caching to improve performance when checking if one set of evidence matches another.
member.param: The key to get the order for.
member.returns: The order, where lower values indicate a higher order of precedence.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsageTracker
member.summary: Wrapper for EvidenceKeyFilter for Share Usage, to be used with the ShareUsageTracker to exclude specific evidence keys from the filter

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsageTracker.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor This constructor will create a filter that will include all evidence. (Except the default excluded items)

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.EvidenceKeyFilterShareUsageTracker.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: A list of the names of the HTTP headers that share usage should not send to 51Degrees.
A list of the names of query string parameters that share usage should send to 51Degrees. If this value is null, all query string parameters are shared.
If true then the asp.net session cookie will be included in the filter.
The name of the cookie that contains the asp.net session id.

member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.FiftyOneDataFile.DataDownloadType
member.summary: Get the type name to send when checking for data file updates.
member.remarks: In general, this value should be pulled from the Engine, which will have read it from the data file. However, in some cases, we want to know the type name before the engine is created. (e.g. when UpdateOnStartup is set) This is why the value can also be set.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.FiftyOneUrlFormatter
member.summary: 51Degrees specific URL formatter. This formats a data file download URL using the parameters required by the 51Degrees distributor.

member.summary: Get the URL to call to request an updated version of the supplied data file.
member.param: The data file to build an update URL for.
member.returns: The URL to call in order to check for and download an update.
member.exception: Thrown if the supplied data file is null

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Data.FiftyOneUrlFormatter.GetFormattedDataUpdateUri(FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Data.IAspectEngineDataFile)
member.summary: Get the URL to call to request an updated version of the supplied data file.
member.param: The data file to build an update URL for.
member.returns: The URL to call in order to check for and download an update.
member.exception: Thrown if the supplied data file is null

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBase`1
member.summary: 51Degrees specific Engine base class. This adds the concept of license keys to the standard Engine base class.
Constructor
member.param: The logger to use
The factory function to use when the engine creates an instance.
The directory to use when storing temporary copies of the data file(s) used by this engine.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBase`1.Profiles
member.summary: The profiles that are present in the data source for this engine. A Profile is a set of specific property values. Each profile is associated with a component. For example, the 'hardwareProfile' component has an 'iPhone 8' profile that would contain properties relating to that hardware device.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBase`1.Components
member.summary: The components that are present in the data source for this engine. A 'component' refers to a logical sub-set of the collection of properties related to an event (usually an HTTP request). For example, the 'hardwareProfile' component groups all properties related to the hardware device that is being used to make the request. Examples of other components would be: the operating system, the browser software, the physical location the request is being made from, the ISP serving the request, etc.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBase`1.Values
member.summary: The values that are present in the data source for this engine. A 'value' is uniquely identified by the combination of a property and a value that property can have. For example, 'HardwareModel' is a property and a possible value could be 'A1234'. If another property 'HardwareVariants' had the same value of 'A1234', that would be a separate IValueMetaData instance.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBase`1.GetDataDownloadType(System.String)
member.summary: The default value for the 'Type' parameter when checking for updates from the 51Degrees 'Distributor' web service.
member.param: The identifier for the data file that we want to get the download type for.
member.returns: The string value to use for the 'Type' parameter when making a request to the 51Degrees Distributor.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBuilderBase`2
member.summary: A base class for engine builders for on-premise engines that use a single data file and use the 51Degrees Distributor web service to check for and download data updates.
member.typeparam: The specific type of the builder.
The type of the engine that this builder builds.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBuilderBase`2.DefaultDataDownloadType
member.summary: The default value to use for the 'Type' parameter when sending a request to the Distributor

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBuilderBase`2.#ctor(FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Services.IDataUpdateService)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBuilderBase`2.SetDataDownloadType(System.String)
member.summary: Set the 'type' string that will be sent to the 'distributor' service when downloading a new data file. Note that this is only needed if using UpdateOnStartup. Otherwise, the update service will use the type name from the existing data file. The default value is provided by the specific engine builder implementation.
member.param: The download type to use. For example 'HashV4'.
member.returns: This builder.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.FiftyOneOnPremiseAspectEngineBuilderBase`2.NewAspectEngineDataFile
member.summary: This method is called when the builder needs to create a new instance.
member.returns: A new instance with the DataDownloadType property set based on the configuration of this builder.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for ShareUsage elements. Contains common functionality such as filtering the evidence and building the XML records.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._httpClient
member.summary: The HttpClient to use when sending the data.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.HttpClient
member.summary: The HttpClient to use when sending the data.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageData
member.summary: Inner class that is used to store details of data in memory prior to it being sent to 51Degrees.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageData.SessionId
member.summary: The Pipeline session id for this event.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageData.Sequence
member.summary: The sequence number for this event. This is incremented as requests are made using the associated session id.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageData.ClientIP
member.summary: The source IP address for this event.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageData.EvidenceData
member.summary:
The evidence data from this event. The dictionary key is the first part of the evidence key. The value is another dictionary containing the rest of the evidence key and the evidence value. For example, the evidence "header.user-agent"="ABC123" would become:
{ Key = "header", Value = { Key = "user-agent" Value = "ABC123" }}

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.LOCALHOSTS
member.summary: IP Addresses of local host device.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.EvidenceCollection
member.summary: Queue used to store entries in memory prior to them being sent to 51Degrees.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._sendDataTask
member.summary: The current task sending data to the remote service.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._lock
member.summary: Lock to use when starting a new send data task.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._addTimeout
member.summary: Timeout to use when adding to the queue.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.TakeTimeout
member.summary: Timeout to use when taking from the queue.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._tracker
member.summary: The tracker to use to determine if a instance should be shared or not.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.MinEntriesPerMessage
member.summary: The minimum number of request entries per message sent to 51Degrees.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._interval
member.summary: The interval is a timespan which is used to determine if a piece of repeated evidence should be considered new evidence to share. If the evidence from a request matches that in the tracker but this interval has elapsed then the tracker will track it as new evidence.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._sharePercentage
member.summary: The approximate proportion of requests to be shared. 1 = 100%, 0.5 = 50%, etc.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.FlowElements
member.summary: Return a list of in the pipeline. If the list is null then populate from the pipeline. If there are multiple or no pipelines then log a warning.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageUrl
member.summary: The base URL to send usage data to.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.ShareUsageUri
member.summary: The base URL to send usage data to.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.WriterSettings
member.summary: The settings to use when creating an XML payload to send to the usage sharing web service.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.DEFAULT_ELEMENT_DATA_KEY
member.summary: The default element data key that will be used for this element.

member.summary: The data key for this element

member.summary: Get the evidence key filter for this element.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase._flagBadSchema
member.summary: Set to true if the evidence within a flow data contains invalid XML characters such as control characters.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.HostAddress
member.summary: Get the IP address of the machine that this code is running on.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.Properties
member.summary: Get a list of the meta-data relating to the properties that this flow element will populate. For this share usage element, the list will always be empty as it does not populate any properties.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.IsCanceled
member.summary: Indicates whether share usage has been canceled as a result of an error.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.IsRunning
member.summary: True if there is a task running to send usage data to the remote service.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBase.SendDataTask
member.summary: Currently running task which is sending the usage data to the remote service.
Constructor
member.param: The logger to use.
The to use when sending request data.
The approximate proportion of requests to share. 1 = 100%, 0.5 = 50%, etc.
The minimum number of request entries per message sent to 51Degrees.
The maximum number of items to hold in the queue at one time. This must be larger than minimum entries.
The timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to add an item to the queue. If this timeout is exceeded then usage sharing will be disabled.
The timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to take an item to the queue.
The interval (in minutes) which is used to decide if repeat evidence is old enough to consider a new session.
Set if the tracker should consider sessions in share usage.
The URL to send data to
A list of the names of the HTTP headers that share usage should not send to 51Degrees.
A list of the names of query string parameters that share usage should send to 51Degrees. If this value is null, all query string parameters are shared.
The name of the cookie that contains the asp.net session id.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.RepeatEvidenceInterval
member.summary: Where a set of evidence values exactly matches a previously seen set of evidence values, it will not be shared if that situation occurs within this time interval. (in minutes)

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SharePercentage
member.summary: The approximate proportion of events to share. Specified as a floating point number from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.MinimumEntriesPerMessage
member.summary: The minimum number of entries to be present in the XML PAyload before it is sent to the usage sharing endpoint.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.MaximumQueueSize
member.summary: Set the maximum number of entries to be stored in the queue to be sent. This must be more than the minimum entries per message. By default, the value is calculated automatically based on the MinimumEntriesPerMessage setting.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.AddTimeout
member.summary: The timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to add an item to the queue. If this timeout is exceeded then usage sharing will be disabled.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.TakeTimeout
member.summary: The timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to take an item from the queue in order to send to the remote service.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.ShareUsageUrl
member.summary: The remote endpoint to send usage data to.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.ShareUsageUri
member.summary: The remote endpoint to send usage data to.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.AspSessionCookieName
member.summary: The name of the cookie that contains the asp.net session id. This is used to help prevent the same usage data being shared multiple times.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.BlockedHttpHeaders
member.summary: A list of HTTP headers that should not be shared.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.IncludedQueryStringParameters
member.summary: A list of query string parameters to be shared.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.IgnoreDataEvidenceFilter
member.summary: A collection of evidence keys and values which, if present, cause the event to be ignored for the purposes of usage sharing.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.TrackSession
member.summary: Controls whether session tracking is enabled or disabled. If enabled, requests from a single user session will only be shared once.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.ShareAllEvidence
member.summary: If set to true then all evidence values will be shared.

member.summary: By default query string and HTTP form parameters are not shared unless prefixed with '51D_'. This setting allows you to share these parameters with 51Degrees if needed.

member.exception: Thrown if the parameter is null

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetIncludedQueryStringParameters(System.String)

member.exception: Thrown if the parameter is null

member.returns: This builder instance

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetBlockedHttpHeaders(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: By default, all HTTP headers (excluding a few such as 'cookies') are shared. Individual headers can be excluded from sharing by adding them to this list.
member.param: The (case insensitive) names of the headers to block.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetBlockedHttpHeader(System.String)
member.summary: By default, all HTTP headers (excluding a few such as 'cookies') are shared. Individual headers can be excluded from sharing by adding them to this list.
member.param: The (case insensitive) name of the header to block.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetIgnoreFlowDataEvidenceFilter(System.String)
member.summary: This setting can be used to stop the usage sharing element from sharing anything about specific requests. For example, if you wanted to stop sharing any details from requests where the user-agent header was 'ABC', you would set this to "header.user-agent:ABC"
member.param: Comma separated string containing entries in the format [evidenceKey]:[evidenceValue]. Any requests with evidence matching these entries will not be shared.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetSharePercentage(System.Double)
member.summary: Set the percentage of data that the should be sharing.
member.param: The proportion of events sent to the pipeline that should be shared to 51Degrees. 1 = 100%, 0.5 = 50%, etc.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetMinimumEntriesPerMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: The usage element will group data into single requests before sending it. This setting controls the minimum number of entries before data is sent. If you are sharing large amounts of data, increasing this value is recommended in order to reduce the overhead of sending HTTP messages. For example, the 51Degrees cloud service uses a value of 2500.
member.param: The minimum number of entries to be aggregated by the before they are sent to the remote service.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetMaximumQueueSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the maximum number of entries to be stored in the queue to be sent. This must be more than MinimumEntriesPerMessage. By default, the value is calculated automatically based on the MinimumEntriesPerMessage setting.
member.param: Size to set

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetAddTimeout(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to add an item to the queue. If this timeout is exceeded then usage sharing will be disabled.
member.param: Timeout to set

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageBuilderBase`1.SetTakeTimeout(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the timeout in milliseconds to allow when attempting to take an item from the queue in order to send to the remote service.
member.param: Timeout to set

member.param: The interval in minutes.

member.returns: The newly created element.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageElement
member.summary: Flow element that sends usage data to 51Degrees for analysis. The type and quantity of data being sent can be customised using the options on the constructor. By default, data is queued until there are at least 50 items in memory. It is then serialised to an XML file and sent to the specified URL.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.FlowElements.ShareUsageElement.BuildAndSendXml
member.summary: Create the XML file from the specified data and send it to the configured URL.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.ExceptionSetHeadersNotSetHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property name '{0}' does not start with 'SetHeader'.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.ExceptionSetHeadersWrongFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property name '{0}' is not in the expected format (SetHeader[Component][HeaderName]).

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.ExceptionShareUsageMinimumEntriesTooLarge
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The minimum entries per message cannot be larger than the maximum size of the queue.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.ExceptionShareUsageSinglePipeline
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot add ShareUsageElement to multiple pipelines.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageFailSequenceNumberIncrement
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to increment usage sequence number.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageFailSequenceNumberParse
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value for the sequence parameter is not valid. See http://51degrees.com/documentation/_info__error_messages.html#Sequence_value_invalid for more information..

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageFailSequenceNumberRetreive
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to retrieve sequence number.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageShareUsageCancelled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Usage sharing was canceled due to an error.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageShareUsageFailedToAddData
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share usage was canceled after failing to add data to the collection. This may mean that the max collection size is too low for the amount of traffic / min devices to send, or that the 'send' thread has stopped taking data from the collection.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageShareUsageInvalidConfig
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration for '{0}' is invalid.{1}.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageShareUsageNoPipelines
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share usage element not registered to any Pipelines. Unable to populate flow element information.

member.name: P:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Messages.MessageShareUsageTooManyPipelines
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share usage element registered to {0} Pipelines. Unable to populate flow element information.

member.name: T:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker
member.summary: A tracker used by share usage to attempt to avoid repeatedly sending data relating to the same user session.

member.name: F:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker._filter
member.summary: The filter that defines which evidence keys to use in the tracker.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker.#ctor(FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.Configuration.CacheConfiguration,System.TimeSpan,FiftyOne.Pipeline.Core.Data.IEvidenceKeyFilter)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The cache configuration to use when building the internal cache used by this tracker
The that defines the evidence values to use when creating a key from an .
The tracker will return a match and update the matching entry if it is younger than this time interval. If it is older then it will not return a match.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker.GetFilter
member.summary: Get the evidence filter used to create keys for this tracker.
member.returns: The to use.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker.Match(FiftyOne.Pipeline.Core.Data.IFlowData,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Called when the flow data matches an existing entry in the tracker
member.param: The flow data
The meta-data value associated with the flow data in the tracker.
member.returns: Boolean - if tracked values age is less than the period set by then return true and update. Else if older then consider new and return false.

member.name: M:FiftyOne.Pipeline.Engines.FiftyOne.Trackers.ShareUsageTracker.NewValue(FiftyOne.Pipeline.Core.Data.IFlowData)
member.summary: Called when a new instance of this tracker's meta-data is needed to add to the tracker.
member.param: The that is being added to the tracker.
member.returns: True as the meta-data holds no extra detail for this tracker.
